comments.name: Global_Vision
comments.content: Interesting to see Amazon suspending drone delivery in Italy, while Waymo is testing autonomous taxis in London. It shows the varying regulatory and logistical challenges globally for these 'future tech'. Also, the OLEDoS penetration forecast for VR/MR by 2030 is quite bullish. We're definitely at an inflection point for immersive tech, but execution and infrastructure are key. Korea's IPO market growth is also noteworthy, demonstrating investor confidence in certain sectors, unlike some A-shares or H-shares volatility. It's a complex global landscape, really.🤔🌍📈
